Requirements • University graduates • 1-2 years Experience in Sales & Marketing • Good disposition, resourceful, goal-driven and possess good interpersonal and communication skills • Independent with a positive learning attitude and a sense of integrity • Fluent in English communication • MS office proficient • Suitable fresh graduates will also be considered • Occasional traveling required
